column5: Unlock your career in cybersecurity with a master’s degree. The digitalisation of our society has led to an increased focus on cybersecurity. This has created a significant demand for skilled professionals who can effectively address the ever-growing threats posed by cyber-attacks and breaches. By choosing this one year master's programme, you will position yourself at the forefront of this expanding field and tap into numerous job opportunities.
column7: For the first semester: 75000 SEK Total tuition fee: 150000 SEK  Tuition fees do NOT apply for EU/EEA citizens or exchange students
